title: PaperTalks
description: Built an intelligent reasoning chatbot for research papers using RAG, PDF parsing, Langchain, DeepSeek-r1, GROQ, and FAISS. Developed a dynamic discussion platform allowing users to tag teachers or peers in documents for enhanced collaborative learning.

title: DevApply
description: Contributed to building an app helping software engineers track applications, interview questions and analyze their performance. Implemented dashboard and authentication with real-time syncing including AI analytics, mock interviews and resume enhancement.

title: Humans of Technology
description: Created an interactive museum highlighting notable figures in technology, featuring AI-powered chatbots for dynamic interactions. Leveraged the OpenAI API to enable seamless, natural conversational interactions with virtual representations of historical personas.

title: Heroes vs Villains
description: Created an app that detects the hero and villain from movies or TV series using GPT, allowing users to interact with both characters. Integrated OpenAI GPT-4o API for generating Q&A, AI-generated character images and Implemented Text-to-Speech functionality.

title: Cancer Prediction Using Gene Expression Data
description: Utilized scikit-learn for model implementation, achieving high accuracy with Random Forest and Support Vector Machine models. Conducted extensive data preprocessing, feature selection, and detailed visualization using Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.

title: Heart Disease Prediction Using Cardiovascular Data
description: Comprehensive heart disease prediction model using machine learning techniques. Analyzed health metrics including age, gender, chest pain type, and cholesterol levels. Performed extensive data preprocessing with outlier treatment using IQR method, feature engineering with Box-Cox transformations, and categorical encoding.
